mapper.select: SELECT * FROM STANDARDIZATION WHERE table_name = #{ table_name } and column_name = #{ column_name }

select s.id, m.table_name ,s.meta_column_id, m.column_name as column_name ,s.group_code_id, g.name as group_code_name ,s.detail_code_id, d.name as detail_code_name from STANDARDIZATION s left join META_COLUMN m ON s.meta_column_id = m.id left join group_code g ON s.group_code_id = g.id left join detail_code d ON s.detail_code_id = d.id where s.table_name = #{table_name}
